title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2025-1117: Important priority package update for jakarta-mail
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2025-7962:
	In Jakarta Mail 2.2 it is possible to preform a SMTP Injection by utilizing the \r and \n UTF-8 characters to separate different messages.
